ComicInfo.Summary:
“…A THOUSAND DEATHS” PART TWO!
Djall is the hottest new art curator in San Francisco. When Phoebe gets a premonition of an attack at a gallery, the Charmed Ones learn that Djall is more than he seems. The Halliwell sisters are back in action, in the long-awaited comic series that fans of the cult TV show have been clamoring for!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Joe Corroney | 1 | B | Cover B | Mary Sanapo | 2 | C | Photo Cover C | Photo | 3 | D/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Cover | Joe Corroney | 4 | E/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Cover | Mary Sanapo | 5 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-29 10:33:27. [CVDB591773]
ComicInfo.Characters: Djall, Paige Matthews, Phoebe Halliwell, Piper Halliwell
